results.name: a(0) = 0, for n >= 1, a(n) = A275736(n) XOR a(A257684(n)), where XOR is given by A003987.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40320
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
formula: a(0) = 0, for n >= 1, a(n) = A275736(n) XOR a(A257684(n)), where 2-argument function XOR is given by A003987.
program: (definec (A275808 n) (if (zero? n) n (A003987bi (A275736 n) (A275808 (A257684 n))))) ;; Where A003987bi implements bitwise-XOR (A003987)
xref: Cf. A275809 (positions of zeros), A275810 (and their first differences).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 09 2016
